“What time is it now?” she said.

quote_last:
.”
“In the morning?”
Herera’s friend leered at her. “No, there’s a total eclipse of the sun.”
title: Freedom
author: Jonathan Frantzen

quote_last: when Sherlock Holmes returned from his excursion. He held in his hand a sheet of blue paper, scrawled over with notes and figures.
title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
